channel.title: Behance Network Featured Projects
channel.description: The latest projects featured on the Behance Network

item.title: I Can't Seem to Get Rid of the Horses
item.description: The collection is a transformation of her own recurring childhood fantasies of wild horse adventures into wearable jewellery pieces. The pieces are a physical manifestations of surreal equestrian creatures, reminiscing early childhood fantasies made up sitting underneath her grandmothers kitchen table. The repeating horse figures place emphasis on the reoccurrence of her own infantile world of make-believe. The collection contains various neck pieces, rings, hoop earrings, bracelet. All hand made by the designer. All gold plated.
item.content:encoded: The collection is a transformation of her own recurring childhood fantasies of wild horse adventures into wearable jewellery pieces. The pieces are a physical manifestations of surreal equestrian creatures, reminiscing early childhood fantasies made up sitting underneath her grandmothers kitchen table. The repeating horse figures place emphasis on the reoccurrence of her own infantile world of make-believe. The collection contains various neck pieces, rings, hoop earrings, bracelet. All hand made by the designer. All gold plated.

item.title: Special Hommage Norman Rockwell
item.description: I love the picture of American artist Norman Rockwell. If you look at his paintings have a sense of humor, yet serious, and there is a message. And enough of the colors and the figures are too fond of the expression.
item.content:encoded: I love the picture of American artist Norman Rockwell. If you look at his paintings have a sense of humor, yet serious, and there is a message. And enough of the colors and the figures are too fond of the expression.

item.title: Division of Industrial Design
item.description: In 2011, The Division of Industrial Design at National University of Singapore, gained independence from the Department of Architecture. In line with this transformation, we designed the division's identity, brand guidelines and a retrospective book to celebrate their 2010 - 2011 achievements.
item.content:encoded: In 2011, The Division of Industrial Design at National University of Singapore, gained independence from the Department of Architecture. In line with this transformation, we designed the division's identity, brand guidelines and a retrospective book to celebrate their 2010 - 2011 achievements.

item.title: Tapeart for Nike Stadium Berlin
item.description: We made some Tapeartworks for Nike Stadium Berlin around the whole city and on a Truck with a DJ inside with the purpose to support a run by the Graviteam Berlin. Thanks to Svenja and Eliza of Bold Agency and very special thanks to Bärbel of Letters are my friends!
item.content:encoded: We made some Tapeartworks for Nike Stadium Berlin around the whole city and on a Truck with a DJ inside with the purpose to support a run by the Graviteam Berlin. Thanks to Svenja and Eliza of Bold Agency and very special thanks to Bärbel of Letters are my friends!

item.title: Mollet del Vallès General Hospital
item.description: First of all, by taking advantage of the slope of the site, the new Public General Hospital was approached as a predominantly horizontal structure with volumes that unfold over the terrain in a staggered sequence as a way by which to reduce the visual impact of the building. Secondly, the volumes are organized around interior garden patios that provide light and ventilation. Finally, a large public plaza has been placed at the main entrance of the hospital where a huge ancient oak tree has been conserved. The plaza is a fundamental element of the design in that it penetrates inside the hospital where it is integrated into a circulation space that recalls a rambla the traditional pedestrian promenade that characterizes Catalan cities acting as a link between the city and the buildings interior. The hierarchy established in the circulation zones guarantees fluid movement for all the users of the building as well as its correct management. Moreover, it is a flexible system that can be adapted to different functional demands in the future.
item.content:encoded: First of all, by taking advantage of the slope of the site, the new Public General Hospital was approached as a predominantly horizontal structure with volumes that unfold over the terrain in a staggered sequence as a way by which to reduce the visual impact of the building. Secondly, the volumes are organized around interior garden patios that provide light and ventilation. Finally, a large public plaza has been placed at the main entrance of the hospital where a huge ancient oak tree has been conserved. The plaza is a fundamental element of the design in that it penetrates inside the hospital where it is integrated into a circulation space that recalls a rambla the traditional pedestrian promenade that characterizes Catalan cities acting as a link between the city and the buildings interior. The hierarchy established in the circulation zones guarantees fluid movement for all the users of the building as well as its correct management. Moreover, it is a flexible system that can be adapted to different functional demands in the future.

item.title: HTC Evo 4G
item.description: Lead Designer, with One & Co and HTC 2009, 12 months HTC / Sprint The World's First 4G Smartphone - I was the lead designer of this project while working at One & Co, San Francisco. It was designed in 2009 and took a total of about 12 months including follow-through to production. It has gathered the 2011 Red Dot Best of the Best Award, 2011 IDSA IDEA Silver Award, and the 2010 Good Design Award from the Chicago Athenaeum. Evo 4G also broke sales records, selling more than 5 million units by June 2011, becoming Sprint's best selling device ever and HTC's most sold phone.
item.content:encoded: Lead Designer, with One & Co and HTC 2009, 12 months HTC / Sprint The World's First 4G Smartphone - I was the lead designer of this project while working at One & Co, San Francisco. It was designed in 2009 and took a total of about 12 months including follow-through to production. It has gathered the 2011 Red Dot Best of the Best Award, 2011 IDSA IDEA Silver Award, and the 2010 Good Design Award from the Chicago Athenaeum. Evo 4G also broke sales records, selling more than 5 million units by June 2011, becoming Sprint's best selling device ever and HTC's most sold phone.

item.title: DACS Episodes
item.description: Designers Against Child Slavery is a Design Collective that enables creatives from all over the world to rise up against the child sex trade. We want to see just how effective artists can be when they start breaking the boundaries of Culture, race, religion, and backgrounds to unite for a just cause, and use their unique styles and talents to give a voice to the voiceless. We are a group of Artists with a passion for making a difference in the world. We leverage our unique gifts and styles to produce artwork, with the intentions of raise awareness about the child sex trade and inspiring others to find a way to use their talents to impact with world.
item.content:encoded: Designers Against Child Slavery is a Design Collective that enables creatives from all over the world to rise up against the child sex trade. We want to see just how effective artists can be when they start breaking the boundaries of Culture, race, religion, and backgrounds to unite for a just cause, and use their unique styles and talents to give a voice to the voiceless. We are a group of Artists with a passion for making a difference in the world. We leverage our unique gifts and styles to produce artwork, with the intentions of raise awareness about the child sex trade and inspiring others to find a way to use their talents to impact with world.

item.title: Magnum Art
item.description: Magnum has developed a technology,allowing them to include liquid filled chocolates into their Ice Creams. They Developed a new forming process based around continuous extrusions that allows them to shape in three dimensions whilst dosing the inclusions. Photographers Diver & Aguilar,were commissioned by Lola,to explore the possibilities of this concept.Producing Art by the creative reformulation of the ingredients. Testing the Big Bang theory,that everything is born out of matter,we have created worlds within worlds,where anything is possible. Firstly to imagine the possibilities , then to create the event,the artists worked with various techniques to capture their vision.
item.content:encoded: Magnum has developed a technology,allowing them to include liquid filled chocolates into their Ice Creams. They Developed a new forming process based around continuous extrusions that allows them to shape in three dimensions whilst dosing the inclusions. Photographers Diver & Aguilar,were commissioned by Lola,to explore the possibilities of this concept.Producing Art by the creative reformulation of the ingredients. Testing the Big Bang theory,that everything is born out of matter,we have created worlds within worlds,where anything is possible. Firstly to imagine the possibilities , then to create the event,the artists worked with various techniques to capture their vision.

item.title: Norheim
item.description: Norheim er en egen merkevare for Gresvig, solgt gjennom G-Sport butikkene. Trenden i retning av mer tekniske klær hadde påvirket salget av Norheim-produktene. Norheim er en fantastisk merkevare, men hadde ikke fulgt med i timen. Det var nødvendig for oss å legge større ressurser i designet av kolleksjonene. Vi måtte revitalisere Norheim for å gjøre det mer tiltalende for dagens frilufts entusiaster, kommenterer Kjetil Løken, markedssjef i Gresvig. - Norheim er et merke som står sterkt i norske hjerter. Når vi analyserte merkevaren så vi at det var sterke bånd til det. Alle virket til å ha gode minner med Norheim fra sin egen oppvekst, kommenterer Gary Swindell, kreativ leder i Mission. Vår utfordring lå i å få frem disse følelsene, samtidig som vi måtte møte kravene som settes til et tidsriktig sports-merke. - Mission moderniserte identiteten med tanke på mangfold og allsidighet. Merkebyggingen vil bli sett på tvers av bekledning, fottøy og utstyr. Dette omfatter bl.a. etiketter, merke-lapper og pakningsdesign. - Vi valgte Mission på grunn av styrken i deres tidligere arbeide for sports-merker, fortsetter Kjetil Løken. Relanseringen av Norheim er et viktig initiativ fra Gresvig sin side, og vi behøvde designere som kunne håndtere våre strategiske og kreative ambisjoner uten å miste synet på merkets historie. Vi har store forventninger til Missions bidrag.
item.content:encoded: Norheim er en egen merkevare for Gresvig, solgt gjennom G-Sport butikkene. Trenden i retning av mer tekniske klær hadde påvirket salget av Norheim-produktene. Norheim er en fantastisk merkevare, men hadde ikke fulgt med i timen. Det var nødvendig for oss å legge større ressurser i designet av kolleksjonene. Vi måtte revitalisere Norheim for å gjøre det mer tiltalende for dagens frilufts entusiaster, kommenterer Kjetil Løken, markedssjef i Gresvig. - Norheim er et merke som står sterkt i norske hjerter. Når vi analyserte merkevaren så vi at det var sterke bånd til det. Alle virket til å ha gode minner med Norheim fra sin egen oppvekst, kommenterer Gary Swindell, kreativ leder i Mission. Vår utfordring lå i å få frem disse følelsene, samtidig som vi måtte møte kravene som settes til et tidsriktig sports-merke. - Mission moderniserte identiteten med tanke på mangfold og allsidighet. Merkebyggingen vil bli sett på tvers av bekledning, fottøy og utstyr. Dette omfatter bl.a. etiketter, merke-lapper og pakningsdesign. - Vi valgte Mission på grunn av styrken i deres tidligere arbeide for sports-merker, fortsetter Kjetil Løken. Relanseringen av Norheim er et viktig initiativ fra Gresvig sin side, og vi behøvde designere som kunne håndtere våre strategiske og kreative ambisjoner uten å miste synet på merkets historie. Vi har store forventninger til Missions bidrag.
